member.name: T:Snowflake.Configuration.Serialization.ConfigurationTreeVisitor
member.summary:
Implements a stateless immutable with visitor semantics to reshape a returned by or another . Implementations of Visit should never return .
By convention, returning a should remove the node from the tree. This should especially be checked if implementing .

member.summary:
Serializes a list of configuration nodes.
For each child node to be serialized, the index should be incremented. Serializing a list node will enter a new block, and thus block headers and footers are written at the beginning and end of serialization of this node respectively.
member.param: The list of configuration nodes represented as a
The position or index of the given node within the current block in the context.

members.member:
Waits asynchronously for the process to exit.
The process to wait for cancellation. A cancellation token. If invoked, the task will return immediately as canceled. A Task representing waiting for the process to end. https://stackoverflow.com/questions/36545858/process-waitforexitint32-asynchronously

member.summary: Provides access to save game management

summary.para: Provides helper methods for building for use in implementations.
Enables use of underscore methods for "SeedBuilder syntax". Import this class with a using static directive.
Remember that top-level seeds can be and other awaitables.

member.name: M:Snowflake.Scraping.Extensibility.SeedBuilder.WithSeeds(Snowflake.Scraping.Extensibility.SeedTree[])
member.summary: Continues a seed tree result with a list of nested results. Nested seeds can not be awaitable, but can be returned from an asynchronous context. Use Seed Builder Syntax rather than the full call.
member.param: The list of seed results to return
member.returns: The nested portion of a seed tree result.

member.name: M:Snowflake.Scraping.Extensibility.SeedBuilder._(Snowflake.Scraping.Extensibility.SeedTree[])
member.summary: Continues a seed tree result with multiple nested seeds.
member.param: The list of seed results to return
member.returns: The nested portion of a seed tree result.
